stimulusHtml: While some archaeologists have suggested that the colossal moai of Rapa Nui were moved using wooden sleds made from palm trees, scholars have theorized more recently that the moai were
choicesHtml: carved from stone megaliths already on the site
moved while standing upright with a system of ropes and levers
dragged to their locations by domesticated animals and carts
assembled in place using the ashlar masonry technique
